Uses of Class
freemarker.template.LocalizedString

  • Packages that use LocalizedString 
    Package Description
    freemarker.template
    The fundamental, most commonly used API-s of FreeMarker; start with Configuration (see also the Getting Started in the Manual.)

    • Uses of LocalizedString in freemarker.template

      Subclasses of LocalizedString in freemarker.template 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ResourceBundleLocalizedString
      A concrete implementation of LocalizedString that gets a localized string from a ResourceBundle
